result.reason: AltGr capture is a known RDP ActiveX control (AxMsTscLib) keyboard hook behavior, not an mRemoteNG bug; triage refresh already posted requesting reproduction steps on latest build with no response yet
result.approach: If confirmed reproducible, investigate AxMsTscLib keyboard hook release on focus-loss; likely requires SecuredSettingsEnabled or OnFocusReleased handling in the RDP protocol wrapper, but may be an unfixable upstream ActiveX limitation
